data.name: Costume Clash
data.detailed_description: Costume Clash is a Halloween themed kart based action-adventure game set in a expansive world environment and played from a third-person perspective. The player takes on the role of a Hallowmon. The Player is tasked with completing races across a number of tracks against other players or bots, As the player progresses in the game they will level up while earning Hallow Cores. Build your team of Hallowmon and race your way through the breathtaking world. It is essential to collect items & complete races to unlock your inner power that will aid you in becoming the best racer Costume Clash has ever seen.
data.about_the_game: Costume Clash is a Halloween themed kart based action-adventure game set in a expansive world environment and played from a third-person perspective. The player takes on the role of a Hallowmon. The Player is tasked with completing races across a number of tracks against other players or bots, As the player progresses in the game they will level up while earning Hallow Cores. Build your team of Hallowmon and race your way through the breathtaking world. It is essential to collect items & complete races to unlock your inner power that will aid you in becoming the best racer Costume Clash has ever seen.
data.short_description: Costume Clash is a Halloween themed kart based action-adventure game set in a expansive world environment and played from a third-person perspective. The player takes on the role of a Hallowmon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor i5 or better with 2.7 GHz or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti, Radeon RX 570, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor i7 or better with 2.7 GHz or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 Ti, Radeon RX 580, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
